tool.name: Minfi mset

configfiles.configfile:
require("minfi", quietly = TRUE)
RGSet <- get(load('$input_rset'))
MSet <- preprocessRaw(RGSet)
save(MSet,file = '$output_mset')

tool.help: This tool is transforming a class representing raw (unprocessed) data from a two color micro array - RGChannelSet into a class holding preprocessed data for Illumina methylation microarrays, mapped to genomic location - MethylSet.
